description:
The Nosleep Podcast is proud to present the third part of our Halloween Trilogy to celebrate Halloween Week!
Warning: This episode contains extremely violent and graphic language. Not recommended for anyone under 18 years of age.

This episode is an audio dramatization of the correspondence:;// series of stories written by the Redditor called bloodstains.

Produced by David Cummings and featuring the voice actors:

Nathan MacDonald
Wendy Stolyarov
David Cummings
